void.debounce.description: Delay in milliseconds before running the playground after typing.

void.tsconfigPath.description: Path to tsconfig.json. If null, tries to find it automatically.

void.truncateLength.description: Maximum length of the output decoration text.

void.decoration.color.description: Color of the inline decoration. Can be a hex code or a VS Code ThemeColor ID.

void.decoration.opacity.description: CSS opacity of the inline decoration.

void.decoration.fontStyle.description: CSS font-style of the inline decoration (e.g., 'italic', 'normal').

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.watch: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --watch
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
